reviewText: I really like biblical movies but this movie is done with voice narration explaining what happens in each scene. I'm not fond of movies where the actors are not speaking their lines in the movie. Sorry but I give it 3 stars.
yes they are great stories which are very true!

Wonderfully told from the gospels, this is a great purchase, recounting the life of Jesus. Brings the bible to life in a very personable way. Some of the background music was not needed, but overall this is a great way of teaching the bible and encouraging faith.
Kinda' cheaply made, but it'll do.

Gem or a product showing you the difference of 1950's and Faith compared to the movies today like the TV's "Bible series" and movies like Noah and Exodus. Truly something the whole family can watch and quotes scripture, something it seems today that most don't like to do. Maybe the power of the scriptures is too much for the ungodly to hear.
I really like Nelson Leigh and all the great Christian videos he played in. They were the best.
This is the best portrayal of the life of Christ that is available.  I highly recommend it.

Wonderful film...Nelson Leigh makes a great Jesus.

H. Paka

Received on April 17 - great movie - well satisfied!
All as described and will look at more of your merchandise!
